title: Client issues after latest patch
body:
After a small patch downloaded this morning at some point, my client barely functions.
Every few seconds it will pop up "connection request to pvp.net server timed out". I cannot join a queue without it "retrieving data from server" endlessly. The rare times I did manage to join, I accepted, was then told "Error joining game: active game not found" and kicked from champ select.
I have repaired the client, it did not help.
Is it just me?

replies.body:
I am also experiencing this issue on my client as well. Since I patched my client I have not been able to join a game. When I try to queue it goes to a "Retrieving data from server" loading pop-up before eventually timing out.

Does anyone have a solution?

Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?
